derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent. (as a verb): partly an alteration of obsolete plotch in the same sense (of unknown origin), influenced by blot; partly a blend of blotand botch

entry.def: A blotch is a small unpleasant-looking area of colour, for example on someone's skin.

example.ex: His face was covered in red blotches, seemingly a nasty case of acne.
example.tran: 他满脸红斑，像是起了很严重的粉刺。

means.word_mean: 1. mark with spots or blotches of different color or shades of color as if stained
